text: Michael J. Goldberg is an alternative cartoonist known for the exploration of gay themes in his comics. His work was included in Gay Comix. ==External links== * * Guide to the Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender (LGBT) Collection at the Smithsonian Institution National Museum of American History Archives Center == References == Category:American comics artists Category:Possibly living people Category:Date of birth missing Category:LGBT comics creators
title: M. J. Goldberg
